txt.en:
Dear [placeholder],

You are cordially invited to join the celebrations in Bywater for the annual Farmers Faire!

This late summer festival features food, fun and more. If you wish to travel to the faire, the Michel Delving Stable-master is sending horses that way regularly. I hope you enjoy yourself!

Sincerely,
Opal Goodbody
'Hello there! Are you here for the Farmers Faire? Welcome; I hope I can answer all your questions!'
An Invitation to the Farmers Faire
The Farmers Faire is in Bywater for a limited time!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
Speak with the Festival Announcer, Caltha Tunnelly, at the Farmers Faire in Bywater
Caltha Tunnelly, the Festival Announcer, can be found in Bywater while the Farmers Faire is in town.\n\nYou should speak with Caltha Tunnelly to learn about the Farmers Faire.
